Name: machinaris
Overview: Building upon the official Chia binaries, Machinaris also offers a plot manager, log monitor, and a simple WebUI for Unraid.

chia_protocol.Name: chia_protocol
chia_protocol.Description: The TCP port for connecting to peers.  Port forward at your router.

farmer_port.Name: farmer_port
farmer_port.Description: The TCP port allowing harvesters to connect with on your LAN.  DO NOT port forward at your router.

worker_address.Name: worker_address
worker_address.Description: The IP address of your Unraid server on your LAN for controller/worker communication.

mnemonic.Name: mnemonic
mnemonic.Description: Path to the mnemonic key used by Chia to run.

mode.Name: mode
mode.Description: Determines which services Machinaris starts.  Default is everything (aka fullnode).

auto_plot.Name: auto_plot
auto_plot.Description: When true, a Plotman plotting loop will be immediately launched on start of the container, applying your plotman.yaml settings.

plots_dir.Name: plots_dir
plots_dir.Description: A colon-separated list of all in-container folders holding your completed plots.

blockchains.Name: blockchains
blockchains.Description: The blockchain to farm.  Leave set to 'chia'.

blockchain_db_download.Name: blockchain_db_download
blockchain_db_download.Description: On first launch, whether to download a fully synced copy of the blockchain database, avoidng hours/days of syncing.  Off by default due to inherent risks.  More at: https://github.com/guydavis/machinaris/wiki/Blockchains

appdata.Name: appdata
appdata.Description: Holds app data for the container. Not for temp plotting or final plot storage.

plots1.Name: plots1
plots1.Description: Holds completed Chia plots for farming.

plotting.Name: plotting
plotting.Description: Your fast temp space for plotting, ideally a cache pool or unassigned SSD.
